metadata.name: SpaceBrawl #1
metadata.description: The ultimate tournament to find the mightiest warriors. SpaceBrawlers are highly evolved animals with advanced technology conquering the universes. With over 30 animals to choose from, 20 different weapons, and 10 different armors. Each SpaceBrawler is computer generated and equipped with distinct traits and unique attributes. Which animal class best suits you in battle? The choice is now yours because the ultimate tournament begins today.
